contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox protected area of Australia | name = Keppel Bay Islands National Park | iucn_category = II | image = | caption = | locator_x = | locator_y = | nearest_town_or_city = | coordinates = {{Coord|23|02|30|S|150|52|18|E|type:landmark_region:AU-QLD|display=inline,title}} | area = {{Convert|7.20|km2|sqmi|2|abbr=on}} | established = 1994 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | managing_authorities = [[Queensland Parks and Wildlife Service]] | official_site = }} {{Infobox protected area of Australia | name = Keppel Bay Islands National Park | iucn_category = Ia | image = | caption = | locator_x = | locator_y = | nearest_town_or_city = | coordinates = {{Coord|23|09|39|S|151|04|30|E|type:landmark_region:AU-QLD|display=inline}} | area = {{Convert|1.04|km2|sqmi|2|abbr=on}} | established = 1994 | visitation_num = | visitation_year = | managing_authorities = [[Queensland Parks and Wildlife Service]] | official_site = }} '''Keppel Bay Islands''' are part of both a national park and a scientific national park in [[Queensland]], [[Australia]], respectively 538 km and 518 km northwest of [[Brisbane]]. The islands are positioned in [[Keppel Bay]], off the coast of [[Yeppoon, Queensland|Yeppoon]] and [[Emu Park, Queensland|Emu Park]] on the [[Capricorn Coast]]. The largest island and a popular tourist attraction is [[Great Keppel Island]]. ==See also== {{Portal|Queensland}} * [[Protected areas of Queensland]] {{National Parks of Queensland}} From the early 1950s to about 1994, a small resort of about twelve cabins on North Keppel Island was operated by old Mr Walls, a former train driver. Old Mr Walls was assisted by his daughter, Geraldine, and her husband, who also lived on the island. His son Tim Walls operated the boat service to the Island, firstly in a boat called the Somerset, out of Ross Creek, Yeppoon, then in a larger boat called the Keppel Star, out of the Roslyn Bay Boat Harbour. More recently the island has been run by the Queensland Parks and Wildlife Service. [[Category:National parks of Queensland]] [[Category:Islands of Queensland]] [[Category:Protected areas established in 1994]] [[Category:Central Queensland]] {{Queensland-national-park-stub}}
